text: America's Next Top Model, Cycle 4 is the fourth season of America's Next Top Model. This cycle includes 14 contestants. The winner was 20-year-old Naima Mora. ==Prizes== * A modeling contract with Ford Models * A spread in Elle * A $100,000 contract with CoverGirl ==Contestants== * Brittany Brower * Sarah Dankleman-Dore * Michelle Deighton * Rebecca Epley * Lluviana "Lluvy" Gomez- Gibbs * Keenyah Hill * Naima Mora * Christina Murphy * Brita Petersons-Wald * Tiffany Richardson * Kahlen Rondot * Brandy Rusher * Noelle Staggers ==Episodes== 1\. casting episode 2\. *Best: Tiffany Richardson *Worst: Brita Petersons-Wald & Brandy Rusher *Eliminated: Brita Petersons-Wald 3\. *Best: Keenyah Hill *Worst: Sarah Dankleman-Dore & Brittany Brower *Eliminated: Sarah Dankleman-Dore 4\. *Best: Brittany Brower *Worst: Lluvy Gomez-Gibbs & Brandy Rusher *Eliminated: Brandy Rusher 5\. *Best: Rebecca Epley *Worst: Noelle Staggers & Lluvy Gomez-Gibbs *Eliminated: Noelle Staggers 6\. *Best: Kahlen Rondot *Worst: Rebecca Epley & Lluvy Gomez-Gibbs *Eliminated: Lluvy Gomez- Gibbs 7\. *Best: Brittany Brower *Worst/Eliminated: Tiffany Richardson & Rebecca Epley 8\. *Best: Kahlen Rondot *Worst: Tatiana Dante & Michelle Deighton *Eliminated: Tatiana Dante 9\. *Best: Kahlen Rondot *Worst: Michelle Deighton & Keenyah Hill *Eliminated: Michelle Deighton 10\. *Best: Naima Mora *Worst: Christina Murphy & Brittany Brower *Eliminated: Christina Murphy 11\. *Best: Keenyah Hill *Worst: Naima Mora & Brittany Brower *Eliminated: Brittany Brower 12\. recap episode 13\. *Best: Naima Mora *Worst: Keenyah Hill & Kahlen Rondot *Eliminated: Keenyah Hill *Final Two: Naima Mora & Kahlen Rondot *Winner: Naima Mora 04
title: America's Next Top Model, Cycle 4
